scripts.start: watchify inject/hijack.js -o inject/h_bundle.js & watchify inject/worker.js -o inject/w_bundle.js & watchify backend/background.js -o backend/bundle.js && fg
scripts.build: node shell.js browserify inject/hijack.js -o inject/h_bundle.js & browserify inject/worker.js -o inject/w_bundle.js & browserify backend/background.js -o backend/bundle.js
